name: Greedy Miner
description:
You have a gun, you have a pickaxe, you have mining cart and you are greedy as hell.

Main character is driven by his greed to old mine where lot of miners were buried alive.  The deeper he is the harder it gets, but the gold is something you can't just leave!

Enjoy this little piece we've made for Ludum Dare Jam 48. We made it in 48 hours, we like it a lot and we think about expanding it into full game.

Please leave a feedback
